#summary The Factory module is used to create all other Gears modules
#labels ExperimentalDocs

= Factory Module =

The Factory module is used to instantiate all other Google Gears objects. 

Use [GearsInitJS gears_init.js] in your application to initialize Gears and get access to a Factory object.


= Example =

{{{
// gears_init.js defines google.gears.factory.
<script type='text/javascript' src='gears_init.js'></script>
<script type='text/javascript'>
// Check whether Google Gears is installed.
if (window.google && google.gears) {
  // Instantiate Gears objects
  var db = google.gears.factory.create('beta.database');
  db.open();
}
</script>
}}}
